FOUND IN: Sober dieter: someone who consciously limits their intake for health or other reasons.

CLUE: An alloy of mercury with another metal
FOUND IN: Amalgam: Traditionally, an alloy comprised predominantly of mercury mixed with one or more other metals, such as silver, tin (used in dental fillings), and gold.
Faun: In Roman mythology, fauns (or satyrs) were semi-divine creatures associated with forests, groves, and woodland areas
Born on December 10, 1832, in Germantown, Pennsylvania, Louisa was the second of four daughters born to Amos Bronson Alcott and Abigail May Alcott.
